name: Evilty VR
description:
Evilty is a horror game for virtual reality, it is a game that I created in a very short time for a test of ideas and experience in VR. Is inspired by some famous horror games.
Please consider playing my other steam games at:

Download games

The game requires xbox gamepad. (Keyboard does not work)

Please tell your gaming experience here, if it works on htcvive or OSVR comment how they worked. I only have oculus DK2

Compatibility:
Oculus dk2: work perfect (runtime 0.6, 0.7,0.8) I recommend 0.6
HTC VIVE: Not tested, but it is possible to work with ReVive
OSVR: Not tested,Use oculus runtime 0.6 or higher

  • Windows 7+
  • Intel i5 4590,
  • 8GB RAM o more
  • Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD 290 +
